text: Sil'naya molniya pochti slepit ikh; kak tol'ko ona osvetit im put', oni idut pri ney, a kogda mrak okruzhayet ikh, oni nepodvizhno zamirayut, ne znaya, kuda idti. Eti litsemery, vidya znameniya Allakha na zemle i na nebesakh, kotoryye udivlyayut i porazhayut ikh, gotovy sledovat' po pryamomu puti Allakha, no, spustya nekotoroye vremya, oni vozvrashchayutsya k neveriyu. Yesli by Allakh pozhelal, to otnyal by u nikh slukh i zreniye. Ved' Allakh - Vsemogushchiy i nad vsyakoy veshch'yu moshchen
